description.value:
Heroic Membership: Your adventures have earned you a unique place in a powerful organization. Check the box next to one of the following options and cross the other off your Chronicle Sheet.

□ Lacunafex Membership You have been adopted into the Lacunafex spy network and have access to the following feats and spells:

  • Feats: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Different Worlds], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Reveal Machinations], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Silver's Refrain], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Tweak Appearances].
  • Spells: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Exchange Image], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Join Pasts], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Silver's Refrain], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Spiritual Anamnesis].

□ Bellflower Membership You are a member of the Bellflower Network and gain access to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.cdnkS3A8OpOnRjKu]{Bellflower Tiller} archetype, its associated feats, and the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Bellflower Toolbelt].
